channel.title: Client Problems please help ppl
channel.description:
Hey i have problems with all of my clients nomatter what i download
anyways ive had the most success with galkons client heres the thing
@echo off TITLE Galkons Anarchy start javaws -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0 exit
so when i do that it opens up something dumb and says it cannot launch no matter what i changed it to Java java javaW javaw etc etc if i change it to anything other then javaws it says it cannot find it but when i launch it with javaws it doesnt launch ive been trying get this to work forever changin my path and classpath and yes i did them with caps and without ive tried everything C:\Program Files(x86)\Java\jre6\bin\javaw.exe is the last thing i tried so please help me i cant figure out what to do i cannot use 64 bit im 32bit and im on windows 7 so please help me thanks for any help bye!

item.title: Client Problems please help ppl
item.dc:creator: @Darkmagic42 Darkmagic42
item.description:
@Darkmagic42 wrote:

i tried a code similar to that 1 to and it didnt work, how ever mine runs fine with this 1.

@echo off
Title your title here
java -Xmx500m -cp .;./bin; EGUI

try that 1

Read full topic

item.title: Client Problems please help ppl
item.dc:creator: @elatechris elatechris
item.description:
@elatechris wrote:

Hey i have problems with all of my clients nomatter what i download

anyways ive had the most success with galkons client heres the thing

@echo off
TITLE Galkons Anarchy
start javaws -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0
exit

so when i do that it opens up something dumb and says it cannot launch no matter what i changed it to Java java javaW javaw etc etc if i change it to anything other then javaws it says it cannot find it but when i launch it with javaws it doesnt launch ive been trying get this to work forever changin my path and classpath and yes i did them with caps and without ive tried everything C:\Program Files(x86)\Java\jre6\bin\javaw.exe is the last thing i tried so please help me i cant figure out what to do i cannot use 64 bit im 32bit and im on windows 7 so please help me thanks for any help bye!

Read full topic
